short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcuts for your frequently visited links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a productivity tool for storing your favorite links as keyboard shortcuts. 

How to add a shortcut:
- Open the context menu (right-click anywhere) on the page you want to save
- Click "Shortcuts For Links" --> "Add"

How to use a shortcut:
- Open a new tab (Ctrl + T) or highlight an address bar of the current one (Ctrl + L)
- Type your shortcut
- Hit "Enter"

How this works:
Following the steps in "How to use a shortcut" your browser will try to transfer you to the search result page with your shortcut. The extension reads your tabs URLs and if it's search result page and the search query is in your list of shortcuts it redirects your tab to that link.
